import "./share.css" import PermMediaIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PermMedia'; import LabelIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Label'; import RoomIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Room'; import MoodIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Mood'; import { useContext } from "react"; import {AuthContext} from "../../context/AuthContext" ; const Share = () => { const {user} = useContext(AuthContext) ; return (
Photo or Video
Tag
Location
Feelings
) } export default Share
